IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE MAUI HUMANE SOCIETY IS ORGANIZED FOR THE PREVENTION OF CRUEL AND/OR INHUMANE TREATMENT OF ANIMALS. THEY ALSO PROVIDE SHELTER FOR OLD, HOMELESS, ABANDONED, SICK, OR INJURED ANIMALS, AS WELL AS ENCOURAGE, PROMOTE, AND CONDUCT RESEARCH RELATING TO THE PREVENTION OF CRUEL AND INHUMANE TREATMENT OF ANIMALS. THE SOCIETY GIVES ASSISTANCE TO THE COUNTY OF MAUI BY OPERATING THE ANIMAL SHELTER AND ADOPTION CENTER, AND THE ANIMAL CONTROL PROGRAM ON THE ISLAND OF MAUI.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MAUI HUMANE SOCIETY IS ORGANIZED FOR THE PREVENTION OF CRUEL AND/OR INHUMANE TREATMENT OF ANIMALS. THEY ALSO PROVIDE SHELTER FOR OLD, HOMELESS, ABANDONED, SICK, OR INJURED ANIMALS, AS WELL AS ENCOURAGE, PROMOTE, AND CONDUCT RESEARCH RELATING TO THE PREVENTION OF CRUEL AND INHUMANE TREATMENT OF ANIMALS. THE SOCIETY GIVES ASSISTANCE TO THE COUNTY OF MAUI BY OPERATING THE ANIMAL SHELTER AND ADOPTION CENTER, AND THE ANIMAL CONTROL PROGRAM ON THE ISLAND OF MAUI.
IRS990.Desc: SHELTER OPERATIONS: THE SHELTERING PROGRAM PROVIDES AN OPEN ADMISSION, HIGH VOLUME ANIMAL SHELTER AND ADOPTION CENTER, VETERINARY SERVICES FOR SHELTER ANIMALS, AND PUBLIC EDUCATION ON HUMANE CARE PRACTICES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: HUMANE ENFORCEMENT: THE HUMANE ENFORCEMENT PROGRAM PROVIDES FOR THE ENFORCEMENT OF LAWS REGARDING ANIMAL SHELTERING, DISPOSITIONS AND CRUELTY PREVENTION, EMERGENCY AFTER-HOURS SERVICES FOR INJURED ANIMALS, AND PUBLIC EDUCATION ON THESE TOPICS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: PUBLIC SPAY/NEUTER: THE SPAY & NEUTER PROGRAM PROVIDES LOW AND NO-COST SPAY AND NEUTER SERVICES FOR DOGS AND CATS, WHETHER PRIVATELY OWNED OR FERAL. SURGERIES ARE PERFORMED IN MAUI HUMANE SOCIETY'S VETERINARY CLINIC BY A LICENSED VETERINARIAN.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES: THE HOPE FUND PROGRAM GIVES INJURED AND/OR SICK HOMELESS ANIMALS A SECOND CHANCE FOR LIFE BY PROVIDING THE FUNDS FOR THEM TO RECEIVE SPECIAL MEDICAL CARE. THE TRANSFER AND WINGS OF ALOHA PROGRAMS TRANSFERRED 470 ANIMALS TO ADOPTION-GUARANTEED RESCUES AND SHELTERS THUS SAVING MORE ANIMALS LIVES. THE SOCIETY OFFERS DIRECT RELEASE SERVICES FOR THOSE BRINGING DOGS TO HAWAII. THE SOCIETY OPERATES THE ONLY CREMATORIUM FOR ANIMALS ON MAUI. THE DEVELOPMENT AND COMMUNITY OUTREACH DEPARTMENT STRIVES TO INFORM AND EDUCATE THE PUBLIC, ADULTS AND CHILDREN, ABOUT THE SOCIETY'S LIFE-SAVING WORK FOR THE ANIMALS OF MAUI.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: 2018 OTHER INCOME 19,700 2019 OTHER INCOME 19,799 2020 OTHER INCOME 23,560 2021 OTHER INCOME 24,745 2022 OTHER INCOME 20,832

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MAUI HUMANE SOCIETY'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE INVESTED FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING SPAY AND NEUTERING SERVICES FOR DOGS ONLY.

THE SOCIETY IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND APPLICABLE STATE LAW. THE ACCOUNTING STANDARD ON ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES ADDRESSES THE DETERMINATION OF WHETHER TAX BENEFITS CLAIMED OR EXPECTED TO BE CLAIMED ON A TAX RETURN SHOULD BE RECORDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. UNDER THAT GUIDANCE, THE SOCIETY MAY RECOGNIZE THE TAX BENEFIT FROM AN UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION ONLY IF IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE TAX POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED ON EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION. EXAMPLES OF TAX POSITIONS INCLUDE THE TAX-EXEMPT STATUS OF THE SOCIETY AND VARIOUS POSITIONS RELATED TO THE POTENTIAL SOURCES OF UNRELATED BUSINESS TAXABLE INCOME (UBIT). THE TAX BENEFITS RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS FROM SUCH A POSITION ARE MEASURED BASED ON THE LARGEST BENEFIT THAT HAS A GREATER THAN 50% LIKELIHOOD OF BEING REALIZED UPON ULTIMATE SETTLEMENT. THERE WERE NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS IDENTIFIED OR RECORDED AS LIABILITIES FOR FISCAL YEAR 2023. THE SOCIETY FILES ITS FORMS 990 IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION AND THE OFFICE OF THE STATE'S ATTORNEY GENERAL FOR THE STATE OF HAWAII. THE SOCIETY IS GENERALLY NO LONGER SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE FOR YEARS BEFORE FISCAL YEAR 2020.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 4

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PART I, LINE 4A THE SEVERANCE PAYMENT WAS MADE PURSUANT TO AN AGREEMENT WITH THE FORMER CEO, AND WAS IN REGARDS TO A MUTUAL SEPARATION FROM THE ORGANIZATION. THE PAYMENT REPRESENTS THE AMOUNT OF ACCUMULATED PAID-TIME-OFF, AND SEVEN ADDITIONAL PAID WEEKS AS APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

THE MAUI HUMANE SOCIETY IS ORGANIZED FOR THE PREVENTION OF CRUEL AND/OR INHUMANE TREATMENT OF ANIMALS. THEY ALSO PROVIDE SHELTER FOR OLD, HOMELESS, ABANDONED, SICK, OR INJURED ANIMALS, AS WELL AS ENCOURAGE, PROMOTE, AND CONDUCT RESEARCH RELATING TO THE PREVENTION OF CRUEL AND INHUMANE TREATMENT OF ANIMALS. THE SOCIETY GIVES ASSISTANCE TO THE COUNTY OF MAUI BY OPERATING THE ANIMAL SHELTER AND ADOPTION CENTER, AND THE ANIMAL CONTROL PROGRAM ON THE ISLAND OF MAUI.

OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES: THE HOPE FUND PROGRAM GIVES INJURED AND/OR SICK HOMELESS ANIMALS A SECOND CHANCE FOR LIFE BY PROVIDING THE FUNDS FOR THEM TO RECEIVE SPECIAL MEDICAL CARE. THE TRANSFER AND WINGS OF ALOHA PROGRAMS TRANSFERRED 470 ANIMALS TO ADOPTION-GUARANTEED RESCUES AND SHELTERS THUS SAVING MORE ANIMALS LIVES. THE SOCIETY OFFERS DIRECT RELEASE SERVICES FOR THOSE BRINGING DOGS TO HAWAII. THE SOCIETY OPERATES THE ONLY CREMATORIUM FOR ANIMALS ON MAUI. THE DEVELOPMENT AND COMMUNITY OUTREACH DEPARTMENT STRIVES TO INFORM AND EDUCATE THE PUBLIC, ADULTS AND CHILDREN, ABOUT THE SOCIETY'S LIFE-SAVING WORK FOR THE ANIMALS OF MAUI.
THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY A REPRESENTATIVE OF THE GOVERNING BODY BEFORE IT IS FILED.
A DISCLOSURE STATEMENT IS REVIEWED WITH EACH BOARD MEMBER EACH YEAR AND THE ACCOUNTANT WOULD RECOGNIZE AN INDEPENDENCE ISSUE IF IT WAS TAKING PLACE.
THE GOVERNING BODY UTILIZE HEC AND SAWA SURVEYS TO DETERMINE COMPENSATION TO THE CEO AND TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIALS DURING THE ANNUAL REVIEW.
THE CEO UTILIZES HEC AND SAWA SURVEYS TO DETERMINE COMPENSATION FOR OTHER OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES DURING AN ANNUAL REVIEW.
THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST AND ON THEIR WEBSITE.
